question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. water bottle
B. stop sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The water bottle is held by a person in the foreground, while the stop sign is on a pole further down the street, making the water bottle clearly closer in 3D space.
